short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An enterprise AI assistant available to assist you when browsing the web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Amazon Q Business is a fully-managed generative AI-powered assistant that can answer questions, provide summaries, generate content, and securely complete tasks using data and information from your enterprise systems.

The Amazon Q Business browser extension is an AI assistant readily available as you browse the web. It integrates seamlessly with your browser and workflow, helping you quickly gather insights from web pages, uploaded files, and your enterprise knowledge without leaving your current tab.

With the extension, you can:

* Summarize web pages with one click to quickly understand the most important information.
* Ask questions about web pages or uploaded files to gain insights across multiple sources.
* Access your Amazon Qâ€™s general knowledge on the go, making informed decisions while completing tasks.
* Request other generative AI tasks like content creation, categorization, translations, and data analysis to uncover insights to enhance your browsing experience. 

To learn more about the Amazon Q Business browser extension and its features, visit our product and support pages.
